---

The blade of this _+1 [sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)_ is engraved to look like the curving feather of a particularly elaborate quill. The wooden handle has a pen nib at the base. You can use the _wordreaper's_ handle as an ink pen and it never runs out of ink.
